alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 08 at 2:43PM MST until February 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Union County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 8 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light to moderate snow may accompany the strong northerly winds Thursday morning, leading to areas of reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County
